Create Single Indicator Bar Plot with Statistics

Source: R/wp_plot_bar.r
in_plot_one_indic_bar.Rd

Internal function that creates a bar plot for a single indicator across countries. Handles mean/latest values, statistical indicators, and color grouping. Core implementation for simple bar plots.

Used by: wp_plot_bar (via in_plot_core) Uses: in_process_bar_data, in_create_bar_labels, in_create_color_mapping, in_calculate_plot_limits, in_create_bar_legend, in_theme_plot

Produces bar plot with optional:

  • Range indicators (min/max)

  • Median markers

  • Geographic/economic color grouping

  • Value labels

Usage

in_plot_one_indic_bar(
  data,
  y_axis = NULL,
  type = "Mean",
  order = "Variable",
  show_values = "Bottom",
  show_year = 1,
  show_range = TRUE,
  show_median = TRUE,
  color = "Subregion",
  base_size = 16,
  dimensions = c(10, 7)
)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
